title: Ticket #3898: Windows disconnect/reshedule - waiting fix
description:
Windows issue when non-exe format file is attempted to be run as a job

job_basic_bad_exe.run

When you say take a text file which you had end in .exe and submit it as a windows job the starter rightly has a create process failed after bitching that the executable is not a valid windows executable. However all the shadow knows is that it got a disconnect. So it valiantly reschedules the job forever.

job_basic_bad_exe.run tests this see bug ticket #3941
